content.question: The House of the Vettii functioned as a

choices.label: secluded retreat for a Roman patrician
place for worshipping an important deity
home for a prosperous family of freedmen
tomb for a prominent married couple

content.answer: home for a prosperous family of freedmen

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
